name: Curcitrie DEMO (Robot Yaks)
description: Welcome to the world of Curcitrie! Join Pyfor a swordsman who journeys to the far off land of Banana Kingdom to find his old friend Jim Waterbuff. Along the way he finds two people Jacob of the Banana Army and Death of the Knights of Doom. Will you join the heroes with Jacob? Will you join the villains with Death? Or will you fight for yourself? The choice is yours in Curcitrie.
